abstract: Five employees tell of their time working at Brintons and the closure of the factory in 2008.
description: Five employees of carpet manufacturer Brintons and Textile Clothing and Footwear Union tell about their lives before, during and after working at Brintons. The factory closed in June 2008, leaving 100 people without jobs.
